method.name: readFileAsStringGuessEncoding
method.comment: Pass a filepath of a file which you want to guess the character encoding. The result will be returned as a String showing encoding used and a value of confidence. Sample usage: Dim DetectEncoding as GuessEncoding Dim guessedEncoding As String guessedEncoding = DetectEncoding.readFileAsStringGuessEncoding(File.Combine(File.DirRootExternal,"bb.srt")) Note: As with any method reading from a file, you should use Try and Catch to be on the safe side.
